name: botlink-xrd-sdk
description: Components for interacting with Botlink's XRD services
author: Alex Kube <alexander.j.kube@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && tsc && rm -rf build/ && cmake-js -D -d ./src/napi/ -O build compile
scripts.build-typedoc: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf docs/ && typedoc --readme none
